esophageal_imaging.title: Hybrid MRI-CT radiomics nomogram for recurrence risk in locally advanced esophageal cancer
esophageal_imaging.key_findings: Combined MRI texture and CT shape descriptors improved recurrence prediction AUC to 0.87.

esophageal_imaging.title: Transformer-based multimodal imaging model for esophageal cancer survival
esophageal_imaging.key_findings: Temporal fusion of longitudinal CT and MRI scans outperformed Cox baselines by 9% C-index.
